Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Location

The unit is situated within large well-established trading estate in South Bristol with excellent access to A4174 Hengrove Way (Avon Ring Road) and the South Bristol Link Road as well as good access to Bristol City Centre and Bristol International Airport. Nearby occupiers include BT, Selco Builders Warehouse, Consort Services, Howdens Joinery, Lidl, and Home Bargains.



Property Description

+ End terrace warehouse / industrial unit incorporating trade counter

+ Incorporating integral ground floor WC’s, kitchenette, and offices

+ Clear span concrete frame construction

+ Replacement pitched steel profile roof, with 20% translucent roof panels

+ Brick and steel profile sheet cladding

+ 5.78m eaves height, 4.76m minimum clear height

+ Electric sectional up and over roller shutter loading door

+ Secure gated service yard shared with two other occupiers

+ 3 phase electricity

+ EPC rating of C 72



Travel Distances

+ Bristol City Centre – 4.00 miles (6.40 km)

+ Junction 3 of the M32 motorway – 4.50 miles (7.20 km)

+ Bristol International Airport – 7.90 miles (12.70 km)

+ Junction 18 of the M5 motorway – 9.10 miles (14.70 km)

+ Junction 19 of the M4 motorway – 9.40 miles (15.20 km)

+ Junction 21 of the M5 motorway – 17.40 miles (28.10 km)

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: UNIT 3_ PORTSIDE PARK_ KINGS WESTON LANE - FLOORPLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Portside Park is prominently located on Kings Weston Lane, Avonmouth.  This is accessed off St Andrew's Road (A403), the main arterial route linking junction 18 of the M5 at Avonmouth to Junction 1 of the M48.

 The M5 and M49 are accessed via Junction 18/18A of the M5 2 miles to the south and the M4/M5 interchange is approximately 6 miles to the north. Portside Park is located in the heart of Avonmouth which is the most established industrial and distribution area in Bristol. Avonmouth Docks are located 1 mile to the west of the site and Bristol City Centre is approximately 8 miles to the south accessed via the A4 Portway.

 Units 1, 2 and 3 can be combined to provide up to 45,798 sq ft of accommodation with a power supply of 600 KVA.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Portside Park is prominently located on Kings Weston Lane, Avonmouth.  This is accessed off St Andrew's Road (A403), the main arterial route linking junction 18 of the M5 at Avonmouth to Junction 1 of the M48.

The M5 and M49 are accessed via Junction 18/18A of the M5 2 miles to the south and the M4/M5 interchange is approximately 6 miles to the north. Portside Park is located in the heart of Avonmouth which is the most established industrial and distribution area in Bristol. Avonmouth Docks are located 1 mile to the west of the site and Bristol City Centre is approximately 8 miles to the south accessed via the A4 Portway.

Units 4 and 5 combined provide a cross docked warehouse totalling 88,300 sq ft of accommodation with a large power supply of 1MVA.
